resources.string: To access your photos, the app needs your permission.
Permission is required to access photos. Grant it in settings.
The app needs permission to send notifications.
Permission to send notifications has been denied. Please grant it in settings.
Daily notifications with photos taken on this date in past years.

To give you the best experience, the app will ask for permission to access your photos so you can relive your memories, and to send you a daily notification with a photo to rediscover. We recommend accepting them to enjoy these features!
